solution_line_template: Since Audrey is older than Heracles by {audrey_older_than_heracles} years, in {years_in_future} years he will be {audrey_age_in_3_years_relative_to_heracles_now} years older than Heracles' current age

In 3 years he will be double Heracles' current age {audrey_age_in_3_years_relative_to_heracles_now} * {double_multiplier} = <<{audrey_age_in_3_years_relative_to_heracles_now}*{double_multiplier}={audrey_age_in_3_years}>>{audrey_age_in_3_years}
